java.text: Basic Syntax: Variables, data types, operators, control structures (if, switch, while, for)
Object-Oriented Programming (OOP): Classes, objects, methods, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation, abstraction
Multithreading: Threads, Runnable, synchronization, concurrency concepts
Input/Output (I/O): Reading/writing files, Streams (InputStream, OutputStream, BufferedReader, etc.)

angular_competences.text: Basic Syntax: Variables, data types, operators, control structures (if, switch, while, for)
Components: Creating and using components, communication between components (Input/Output, EventEmitter)
Templates & Data Binding: Interpolation {{ }}, Property Binding [], Event Binding (), Two-way binding [(ngModel)]
Routing & Navigation: Configuring routes, dynamic routing with parameters
